com.epimorphics.lda.renderers

Interface Renderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FeedRenderer, JSONRenderer, RDFXMLRenderer, TextPlainRenderer, TurtleRenderer, VelocityRenderer, XMLRenderer

    public interface Renderer
    Renderers -- turning result sets into byte streams.
    Author:
    chris, dave

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Renderer.BytesOut
      Renderers produce BytesOut objects which will then stream the rendering to a provided output stream later.
      static class  Renderer.UTF8 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MediaType getMediaType(Bindings rc) 
      CompleteContext.Mode getMode() 
      String getPreferredSuffix()
      Answer the format suffix associated with this renderer.

      Render a result set.

    • Method Detail

      • getMediaType

        MediaType getMediaType(Bindings rc)
        Returns:
        the mimetype which this renderer returns in the given renderer context.

      • getMode

        CompleteContext.Mode getMode()
        Returns:
        the shortname completion mode for this renderer;

      • render

        Renderer.BytesOut render(Times t,
                       Bindings rc,
                       Map<String,String> termBindings,
                       APIResultSet results)

        Answer the format suffix associated with this renderer.
